about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
In this unique journey you will start at a magical hand built castle village, built along a riverbed. As you move into the experience enjoy the attention to detail in this village’s build. Next calm your mind with the tranquil bamboo accented creek, soothing and delightful. Finally sit back with the trees as you watch the subtle ripples move across the reflective lake.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self Meditation

Length
10:20

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
